page.title: 08Religion and Beliefs
page.content:
The formal services of worship which take place in Christow and Bridford on Sundays are as follows -
Church of England - one service at Bridford and Christow Churches, either Holy Communion or a Family Service. Average size of congregation 30 but between 60 and 80 on special occasions. Sunday School at Christow Church.
Baptist Church - one service on Sunday afternoon at Christow at which there is a congregation of about 12. Evening service at Bovey Travey - congregation about 120.
